name: Mercy Boma Naps-Nkari
description: Mercy Boma Naps-Nkari is a blockchain security researcher with a focus on strengthening consensus clients and smart contracts. Passionate about improving the reliability and performance of blockchain systems, Mercy has contributed to projects centered on consensus algorithms, fault tolerance, and performance benchmarking. With a love for distributed system engineering and security, She is dedicated to advancing resilient, high-performing blockchain protocols.
